articles.description: With Myles Garrett looking to leave Cleveland and a deep draft, it's a good time to be in the market for an edge rusher.
articles.content: INDIANAPOLIS -- After finalizing his coaching staff, the first line of business for Chicago Bears coach Ben Johnson and his coordinators was discussing the traits and characteristics they need from p… [+5226 chars]
